author: Deflumine
title: fantastic place, great service (except the chinese restaurant)
text:
We started with a tea ceremony in the tea house : a must!!! and they sell their own, excellent, tea
We stayed on executive floor and enjoyed the lounge enormously - service there was faultless.
One can see this hotel spent a lot of time and money on training their staff well.
The rooms are large with high ceiling and the amenties are of this century, modern but not too much and all easy to understand. the rainshower is heaven
I had an issue with my room, but staff was very gracious and they apologised and solved the problem easily and to complete satisfaction
A small minus we had in the chinese restaurant, although food was good the service was in a hurry and almost pushed us out close to 10pm - not in line with overall impression of the hotel
Service and ambiance in the bar was excellent
I regret I didn't try the spa
